parameters: It's a fridge stocked full with cooking ingredients!
There's tons of ingredients here but...\! For some reason there's a lot of Mac n' Cheese...
Remember what mom says, "You'll get fat if you eat a lot of sweet rolls!"
Hi!\! I'm Bessie!\! Is what I would say but right now my part is under construction...
Oh!\! Yes, muuuuuch better!\! Sorry for makin' ya worry about me...\!
Oh!\! Sorry!\! My name is Roz, but everyone calls me Roz-chan!
Oh, Roz-chan!\! That's a very cute name!\! I'm Bessie!
It's good to meet you!\! Um, I just want to know what happened to you back there...
Well...\! I don't really expect you to believe me, but...
I like to think I'm a very skilled chef.\! I've been to many places around the world
and I got back not too long ago from a culinary trip.
B-but I had a nightmare last night...\! Where someone stole some of my cookbooks and and and....
I CAN'T COOK ANYMORE!\! I'VE FORGOTTEN EVERYTHING!
C-calm down, Bessie!\! I believe you!
I think there may be a solution to all of this.\! Maybe if we find something that could
There's a small notebook here with your name on it!
ROZZY!!\! FOLLOW ME TO THE KITCHEN!!
ROZZZZZZZY!!!! IT'S BAAAACK!\! MY COOKING IS BACK!!!
Well, I guess partially.\! I can only remember some things.\! Well, at least try this!
It's actually a chicken recipe I made up a few years ago!\! It's my signature dish!
Oh wow!\! This is the best chicken I've ever had!\! It's so juicy and delicious!
Ara ara~\! Looks like I have a new fan!
Still...\! I can't seem to be able to remember other cooking techniques and recipes that
You said your dream was that someone stole "cookbooks" from you?\! Maybe I could help
find your "cookbooks," just like that notebook of yours.\! I have a hunch of where
Ooh my gosh!\! Rozzy, you would do that for ol' Bessie!?
You're the best!!\! Hmmm...\! How to repay you...
Rozzy!\! If you bring some ingredients to me, I can cook delicious meals for youuuu!
I may not be able to cook much at the moment, but I'm sure I'll get the noggin' going
I'll definitely take you up on that!\! You can count on me!
Hola, Rozzy! Did you bring something for me to cook?
Heehee, cutie!\! Well, I was about to take a short break anyways!\! Today has been kinda long...
Had a lot to do today?\! School was kind of long today as well...
Wait a minute?\! Are you a student, Rozzy?
No?\! I-I'm a part-time teacher at Umikaze High.
Whoopsie!\! Dunno what possessed me to think that haha!\! That reminds me of my college
days...\! I wonder what my partner is doing nowadays.
Oh heavens no haha!\! Um, well Rhod has a specialty school for future chefs, milkers, and
Um...?\! Milkers and milky Rhodians?\! What kind of school do you guys have up there?
Fufufu~\! I'll deff tell you all about it some day!
Welp!\! Look at the time!\! I gotta get back to doing some cooking!\! See you around Rozzy!
Ah, alright!\! Maybe you can help me out with a couple of things!\! I needed a cooking
assistant!\! Here's an apron!\! Let's get crackin'!
Did you cut those onions, Rozzy?
Don't forget to season the chicken, and mix garlic with the butter.
Thanks for the help, Rozzy!\! Come help out again soon!
You know...\! I wanted to ask, why not wear something that fits you more...appropriately?\! I feel
like you're tighly packed down there...
Well, erm...\! I don't know how else to put it other than I just like it tight
Though, for you it might be difficut...
Ara ara~\! The important head is up here, Rozzy~\! Jokes aside, it is.\! Though you know, this
is pretty common for Praquians and Rhodians you know?\! For you though...
I'm only teasing~\! There's probably more than meets the eye for you.\! Perhaps, one day...
That reminds me, I saw a twin-tail kimimi girl walking to the supermarket the other day.\! She
had impressive...uh...marbles to say the least.\! She wears an awfully short skirt too.
Anyways, you should read up on other races really if you haven't!\! It's interesting to know
what things make us different and special!\! I'll be damned if the library here doesn't have
Anyways, should get back to cookin'!\! Stop by again to chat, Rozzy!
Awww~\! Let me know if you need me then!

I just remembered how to work with chocolates!\! Suddenly all my months of training in Praquian
I'm curious though...\! Is Praquian chocolate the best in the world really?\! I've heard
It really is!\! Praquians invented the sophisticated techinique of chocolate tempering and
also their cocoa beans are the best in the world.\! There's even a special type of cocoa
that only grows in one very secret location, known only to the people that distribute it.\!
It's called the "Stallion's Nut," and the chocolate from it is very expensive!
To top it off, Praquians and their Rhodian neighbors have the creamiest "milks!"\!
This makes for some of the awesomest milk chocolate you can find out there! Though Rhodian
milk is the best~\! Maybe someday I'll share some of my Rhodian creamy milk with you~
Well, anyways!\! I guess I can make some chocolately treats for ya!\! Stop by when that

I remember reading this book during my last year at cooking school.\! We had a master sashimi chef
come and teach us how to make sashimi.\! It was an elective, but I am very interested in Gikoku's
food and culture!\! It's how I ended up here.
Ah, so you know how to cook Gikoku food?
Somewhat...\! I know how to make sashimi very well and some other things.\! There's a lot to
Gikoku's food, but most people only really know about a few staple foods.\! Gikoku may be
a large island mass, but most of its dishes use veggies and land animals.
Huh...\! Can't say I've had that many local dishes, other than the main known ones.
Oh!\! When all my cooking skills come back, I'll be sure to learn some local dishes and make
you a big hearty Gikoku-style meal~
Bessie!!\! I got another book for ya!
Hurry up and bring it over!

So these recipes are very simple to make, but are also very delicious.\! It's foods that are from
Kentaros!\! Normally it's very difficult to visit that island, but they are very happy to share their
culture around the world.\! It's very popular everywhere really to eat Kentarian tacos and such!\!
Tortillas really changed the way we eat foods in a lot of places!
So wait, Kentaros is responsible for inventing tacos and burritos?
Burritos is more of a Praquian adaptation really.\! When Kentarian food was brought
over to the main continent, certain innovations were made to it.\! People from Kentaros
certainly loved that. So much so that it is also a staple food there!
Hopefully I can go there some day!
Bessie!!\! I got another book for ya!

I don't know if I mentioned this but, my specialty is baking and confectionery!\! Especially
desserts that are centered around milk products like chocolate and also cakes and tarts!
In my honest opinion, sweets are a lot harder to make.\! There's almost a precise science
to making 'em.\! A lot of people think it's just brownies, cakes and cookies, but nope!\!
Don't worry tho, your mind will be blown hereafter with the types of sweets I can make!\!
That is after I get back all of my skills...
D-don't worry, Bessie!\! You'll be back in tip top shape soon!
Bessie!!\! I got another book for ya!
Hurry up and bring it over!

Some of these recipes take me back...\! I vividly remember working in a top notch
confectionery, and just having an incredibly harsh boss.\! I was fresh off my school so
I was still a bit wet behind the ears.
Were you able to make something out of that experience?
Oh yeah!\! I made a name for myself over there, and even though my boss never said it,
I felt like she did have a whole lot of pride in me as her apprentince.\! I do call her
from time to time just to check on her.
Heehee~\! Well, Rozzy!\! I can almost feel all of my skills coming back!\! Don't hesitate
to try out some of the things I can make now thanks to your help!
Bessie!!\! I got another book for ya!
Hurry up and bring it over!

Rhodian futa milk is very special and rare!\! I don't really dedicate myself to that

W-well anyways!\! To get back on track, after high school I went to that school in Rhodia

It's to make sure you find someone who not only understands how to milk you well, but
also gets along with you extremely well.\! I went through different people but then I
Did you like her right away?
I actually made her life pretty difficult.\! I would do whatever I wanted, and would even just
milk myself and not give her the chance to try!\! She didn't give up on me though.
One day though, I kinda just told her "Fine! You have one chance to milk me! And you better
do it well!"\! I'll never forget her reply haha. "I reckon you'll be putty in my hands!
If not, my name ain't Paula!"
Her hands and technique were godlike.\! Oooh~\! I was indeed putty in her hands.\! After
that we were an inseperable duo!\! She was always very encouraging, and was always making
sure I was doing good.\! It wasn't just because it was part of her job but, she had a
It sounds like it's the line of work where people end up as couples a lot.
Well, not as often as you think really.\! Rodians and milkers take their jobs seriously!\!
We just happened to have an incredibly strong romantic chemistry.
Well, nothing bad actually.\! It was heartbreaking when we split though...
One day I decided to cook something for Paula, and she actually said it was extremely good.\!
Can't remember what it was exactly but she asked for me to cook for her friends too.
Long story short, her friends loved my cooking, my friends loved my cooking, and so
on.\! I realized how much I loved seeing everyone's faces when they tried my food
and how much I enjoyed making delicious foods.
And so, Paula encouraged me to become a chef!\! This meant we wouldn't be partners anymore.\!
We could still date I suppose but...\! I was actually accepted into a different, more
prestigious school for cooking in a different country.
Paula wanted me to go explore the world and become the best chef there is.\! She told me
it's better if we split and stayed friends, as she didn't want me to be held back from
my passion.\! I fought with her because she said this a few days before I left and I
I did say some pretty mean stuff to Paula I still regret to this day but she forgave
me.\! She showed up to the airport to send me off.\! Eventually we stayed in touch,
and still talk every once in a while.\! I did really love her.
Haha! Don't look so glum, Rozzy!\! It was years ago!\! Life moves on!\! Even last time

Hahaha!\! Relax, I just wanted to bully you a little bit~
